lead_paragraph: PATTERSON--Patricia. The School of American Ballet celebrates the life of Pat Patterson, a generous friend and Board Member for over 30 years. Elected to the Board in 1975, Pat was steadfastly dedicated to furthering SAB's mission and worked enthusiastically to widen the School's circle of supporters. We send our gratitude, sympathy and condolences to Pat's daughter Wendy Norris Grant and her family. Max R. Shulman, Chairman of the Board Peter Martins, Chairman of Faculty Marjorie Van Dercook, Executive Director 1/3
